1.verse_text: Great blessings belong to those who don"t listen to evil advice, who don"t live like sinners, and think about them day and night. like a tree planted by a stream– a tree that produces fruit when it should and has leaves that never fall. Everything they do is successful. They are like chaff that the wind blows away. but the wicked have lost their way. and who don"t join those who make fun of God. Sinners have no place among those who do what is right.
Instead, they love the Lord"s teachings
But the wicked are not like that.
When the time for judgment comes, the wicked will be found guilty.
The Lord shows his people how to live,

2.verse_text: Why are the nations so angry? Why are the people making such foolish plans? Let"s break free from them!' The Lord makes fun of them. and it fills them with fear. and he will rule on Zion, my holy mountain.' and you are my son. Everyone on earth will be yours. You will scatter your enemies like broken pieces of pottery!' and learn this lesson. or the Lord will be angry and destroy you. He is almost angry enough to do that now, but those who go to him for protection will be blessed.
Their kings and leaders join together to fight against the Lord and his chosen king. He said to me, 'Today I have become your father,
But the one who rules in heaven laughs at them.
He speaks to them in anger,
He says, 'I have chosen this man to be king,
Let me tell you about the Lord"s agreement:
If you ask, I will give you the nations.
You will rule over them with great power.
So, kings and rulers, be smart
Serve the Lord with fear and trembling.
Show that you are loyal to his son,

3.verse_text: Lord, I have so many enemies. So many people have turned against me. You bring me honor; you give me hope. and he will answer me from his holy mountain. Selah because the Lord covers and protects me. even if thousands of them surround me. My God, come rescue me! If you hit my enemies on the cheek, you will break all their teeth. You are so good to your people. Selah
They say to themselves, 'God will not rescue him!' Selah
I will pray to the Lord,
I can lie down to rest and know that I will wake up,
So I will not be afraid of my enemies,

4.verse_text: God, you showed that I was innocent. You gave me relief from all my troubles. So listen to me now when I call to you for help. Be kind to me and hear my prayer. Do you enjoy wasting your time searching for new lies against me? Selah The Lord listens when I pray to him. Think about this when you go to bed, and calm down. Selah and put your trust in him! because, Lord, you keep me safe.
Men, how long will you try to dishonor me?
You can be sure that anyone who serves the Lord faithfully is special to him.
Tremble with fear, and stop sinning.
Give the right sacrifices to the Lord,
Many people say, 'I wish I could enjoy the good life. Lord, give us some of those blessings.'
But you have made me happier than they will ever be with all their wine and grain.
When I go to bed, I sleep in peace,

5.verse_text: Lord, listen to me and understand what I am trying to say. listen to my prayer. and look to you for help. And every morning you hear my prayers. You hate those who do evil. Lord, you hate those who make secret plans to hurt others. I can worship in your holy Temple with fear and respect for you. and make it easy for me to follow. People are looking for my weaknesses, so show me how you want me to live. They only want to destroy people. Their words come from mouths that are like open graves. Let them be caught in their own traps. They have turned against you, so punish them for their many crimes. Protect and strengthen those who love your name. you surround them with your love, like a large shield that protects them.
Every morning, Lord, I lay my gifts before you
God, you don"t want evil people near you. They cannot stay in your presence. They use their lying tongues to deceive others.
You destroy those who tell lies.
But by your great mercy, I can enter your house.
Lord, show me your right way of living,
My enemies never tell the truth.
But let those who trust in you be happy forever.
Lord, when you bless good people,

6.verse_text: Lord, don"t punish me. Don"t correct me when you are so angry. I am sick and weak. Heal me, Lord! My bones are shaking. Save me because you are so loyal and kind. Those in the grave don"t praise you. I cried to you all night. My pillow is soaked; my bed is dripping wet from my tears. that my eyes are worn out from crying. because the Lord has heard my cries. The Lord has accepted my prayer. They will be sorry when disgrace suddenly comes upon them.
I am trembling all over. Lord, how long until you heal me?
Lord, come back and make me strong again.
If I am dead, I cannot sing about you.
My enemies have caused me such sorrow
The Lord has heard my request for mercy.
All my enemies will be filled with fear and shame.

7.verse_text: Lord my God, I come to you for protection. Save me from those who are chasing me. I will be carried away with no one to save me. or to help his enemies. Let an enemy chase me, catch me, and kill me. Let him grind me into the dirt and put me in my grave. Selah My enemy is angry, so stand and fight against him. Get me the justice that you demand. and take your place as judge. Lord, judge me. Prove that I am right and that I am innocent. Support those who do good. God, you are fair. You know what people are thinking. so he will protect me. He always condemns evil. then God is ready to punish them. He has prepared his deadly weapons. His sword is sharp. His bow is strung, drawn back, and ready to shoot its flaming arrow. they are pregnant with wicked plans, which give birth to lies. but they are the ones who will fall into it. They plan harm for others, but they are the ones who will be hurt. I praise the name of the Lord Most High.
If you don"t help me, I will be torn apart like an animal caught by a lion.
Lord my God, I have done nothing wrong.
I have done nothing to hurt a friend
If that is not the truth, then punish me.
Lord, get up and show your anger!
God helps people who want to do right,
The minds of the wicked are full of evil;
They dig a pit to trap others,
The trouble they cause will come back on them.
I praise the Lord because he is good.

8.verse_text: Lord our Lord, your name is the most wonderful in all the earth! It brings you praise everywhere in heaven. They sing of your power to silence your enemies who were seeking revenge. I see the moon and the stars you created. Why do you even think about them? Why do you even notice them?' and crowned them with glory and honor. You put everything under their control. and the fish that swim in the sea.
From the mouths of children and babies come songs of praise to you.
I look at the heavens you made with your hands.
And I wonder, 'Why are people so important to you? Why do you care so much about humans ?
But you made them almost like gods
You put them in charge of everything you made.
People rule over the sheep and cattle and all the wild animals.
They rule over the birds in the sky
Lord our Lord, your name is the most wonderful name in all the earth!

9.verse_text: I will praise you, Lord, with all my heart. I will tell about the wonderful things you have done. God Most High, I praise your name. but they fell and were destroyed. and you decided that I was right. You destroyed those evil people. You erased their names from our memory forever and ever. You destroyed their cities. There is nothing left to remind us of them. and he will rule forever. He judges all nations honestly. crushed by the weight of their troubles. But the Lord is a refuge for them, a safe place they can run to. come to you for protection. And when they come, you do not leave them without help. Tell the nations about the great things he has done. and remembers those who are in need. When suffering people cry for help, he does not ignore them. See how my enemies are hurting me. Save me from the "gates of death." I will be so happy because you saved me.' They have been caught in their own trap. as will all the nations that forget God. but God will not forget them. He will not leave them without hope. Don"t let anyone think they can win against you. Let them know they are only human. Selah
You make me happy, so I will rejoice in you.
My enemies turned to run from you,
You listened to me from your throne like a good judge,
You told the nations how wrong they were.
The enemy is finished!
The Lord set up his throne to bring justice,
He judges everyone on earth fairly.
Many people are suffering–
Lord, those who know your name
Sing praises to the Lord, who sits as King in Zion.
He punishes murderers
I said this prayer: 'Lord, be kind to me.
Then, at the gates of Jerusalem, I can sing praises to you.
Those other nations have fallen into the pit they dug to catch others.
The Lord showed that he judges fairly. The wicked were caught by what they did to hurt others. Higgayon Selah
The wicked will go to the place of death,
It may seem that those who are poor and needy have been forgotten,
Lord, get up and judge the nations.
Teach them a lesson, Lord.

10.verse_text: Lord, why do you stay so far away? Why do you hide from people in times of trouble? who are caught in their traps and made to suffer. They curse the Lord and show that they hate him. He does not fit into their plans. They don"t understand how you can judge them. They make fun of all their enemies. We will have our fun and never be punished.' and planning evil things to do. waiting to kill innocent people, always looking for any helpless person they can hurt. to catch weak and helpless animals. They lay their traps for the poor, who are caught in their nets. who are already weak and suffering. He is not watching. He will never see what we are doing.' Punish those who are wicked, God. Don"t forget those who are poor and helpless. because they think he will not punish them. You see it, so punish them. Those who were left helpless put their trust in you. After all, you are the one who cares for orphans. Punish them for the evil they have done, and stop them from doing any more. so I know you will remove the wicked nations from your land. Listen to their prayers, and do what they ask. Don"t let powerful people drive us from our land!
The wicked are proud and make evil plans to hurt the poor,
Those greedy people brag about the things they want to get.
The wicked are too proud to ask God for help.
They succeed in everything they do.
They say to themselves, 'Nothing bad will ever happen to us.
They hide just outside the villages,
They are like lions hiding in the bushes
Again and again they hurt people
They say to themselves, 'God has forgotten about us.
Lord, get up and do something.
But, Lord, you do see the pain and suffering they cause.
Break the arms of those who are wicked and evil.
Lord, you are King forever and ever,
Lord, you have heard what the poor want.
Protect the orphans and those who have been hurt.

11.verse_text: I trust in the Lord, so why did you tell me to run and hide? Why did you say, 'Fly like a bird to your mountain?' They get their bows ready and aim their arrows. They shoot at good, honest people. The Lord sits on his throne in heaven. He sees everything that happens. He watches people closely. he hates those who enjoy hurting others. They will get nothing but a hot, burning wind.
Like hunters, the wicked hide in the dark.
What would good people do if the wicked destroyed all that is good? Those who live good lives will be with him.
The Lord is in his holy temple.
The Lord examines those who are good and those who are wicked;
He will make hot coals and burning sulfur fall like rain on the wicked.
The Lord always does what is right, and he loves seeing people do right.

12.verse_text: Save me, Lord! We can no longer trust anyone! All the good, loyal people are gone. They say whatever they think people want to hear. and cut out their bragging tongues. They say, 'We are so good with words, no one will be our master.' and stole what little they had. But the Lord knows what they did, and he says, 'I will rescue those who are poor and helpless, like silver purified by fire, like silver melted seven times to make it perfectly pure. Protect them forever from the wicked people in this world. and everyone thinks evil is something to be praised!
The Lord should cut off their lying lips
Those people think they can win any argument.
They took advantage of the poor and I will punish those who hurt them.'
The Lord"s words are true and pure,
Lord, take care of the helpless.
The wicked are all around us,

13.verse_text: How long will you forget me, Lord? Will you forget me forever? How long must I feel this sadness in my heart? How long will my enemy win against me? Make me feel strong again, or I will die. He will be so happy that he won. I will be happy when you save me. because he was so good to me. How long will you refuse to accept me?
How long must I wonder if you have forgotten me?
Lord my God, look at me and give me an answer.
If that happens, my enemy will say, 'I beat him!'
But I trust in your faithful love, Lord.
Then I will sing to the Lord

14.verse_text: Only fools think there is no God. People like that are evil and do terrible things. They never do what is right. to see if there is anyone who is wise, anyone who looks to him for help. Everyone has turned bad. No one does anything good. No, not one person! And they never ask for the Lord"s help. Don"t they know what they are doing? because God is with those who do what is right. but the Lord will protect them. would bring victory to Israel! When the Lord makes his people successful again, the people of Jacob will be happy; the people of Israel will be glad.
The Lord looks down from heaven
But everyone has gone the wrong way.
Those who are evil treat my people like bread to be eaten.
They will have plenty to fear,
You wicked people want to spoil the hopes of the poor,
I wish the one who lives on Mount Zion

15.verse_text: Lord, who can live in your Holy Tent ? Who can live on your holy mountain? and speak the truth from their hearts. They don"t do things to hurt their neighbors. They don"t tell shameful things about those close to them. and honor those who respect the Lord. If they make a promise to their neighbor, they do not charge them interest. And they refuse to testify against an innocent person, even if someone offers them money to do it. Whoever lives like this will always stand strong.
Only those who live pure lives, do what is right,
Such people don"t say bad things about others.
They hate those who fail to please God they do what they promised.
If they loan money to someone,

16.verse_text: Protect me, God, because I depend on you. 'You are my Lord. Every good thing I have comes from you.' 'They are my powerful gods. They are the ones who make me happy.' I will not share in the gifts of blood they offer to their idols. I will not even say their names. You support me. You give me my share. He is here, close by my side, so nothing can defeat me. Even my body will live in safety, You will not let your faithful one rot in the grave. Just being with you will bring complete happiness. Being at your right side will make me happy forever.
Some of you have said to the Lord,
But you have also said about the gods of this land,
But those who worship other gods will have many troubles.
Lord, you give me all that I need.
My share is wonderful. My inheritance is very beautiful. Even at night he put his instructions deep inside my mind.
I praise the Lord because he taught me well.
I always remember that the Lord is with me.
So my heart and soul will be very happy.
because you will not leave me in the place of death.
You will teach me the right way to live.

17.verse_text: Lord, hear my prayer for justice. I am calling loudly to you. I am being honest in what I say, so please listen to my prayer. because you can see the truth. and looked deep into my heart. You questioned me and found that I did not say or do anything wrong. so I have never been like those who are cruel and evil. My feet never left your path. So listen to me now, and hear what I say. and rescue those who depend on you. Use your great power and protect them from their enemies. Hide me in the shadow of your wings. Protect me from those who come to hurt me. and brag about what they will do. and now they are all around me. They watch me, waiting to throw me to the ground. Like young lions, they hide, ready to attack. Make them surrender. Use your sword and save me from these wicked people. and remove them from this life. But as for the people you treasure, fill them with food. Give them plenty for their children and their grandchildren.
You will make the right decision,
You were with me all night
Unlike most people, I have obeyed your commands,
Every time I call to you, God, you answer me.
Protect me like the pupil of your eye.
Save me from the wicked people who are trying to destroy me.
Like hungry lions, they want to kill and eat.
Lord, get up and face the enemy.
I have done only what is right, so I will see your face. And seeing you, I will be fully satisfied.

18.verse_text: I love you, Lord! You are my strength. He is my God, the Rock I run to for protection. He is my hiding place high in the hills. and he saved me from my enemies! He is worthy of my praise! A deadly flood was carrying me away. Death set its trap right there in front of me. Yes, I cried out to my God for help. There in his temple he heard my voice. He heard my cry for help. The foundations of the mountains trembled. They shook because he was angry. Burning flames came from his mouth. Red-hot coals fell from him. He stood on a thick, dark cloud. racing on the wings of the wind. He was hidden by dark clouds heavy with water. hail broke through the clouds with flashes of lightning. the lightning bolts that threw them into confusion. Then the bottom of the sea could be seen, and the earth"s foundations were uncovered. He pulled me from the deep water. They were too strong for me, so he saved me. but the Lord was there to support me. He took me to a safe place. He was good to me because I am innocent. I have not turned against my God. I never rejected his rules. I have kept myself from sinning. He could see that I am innocent. You are good to those who are good. But you outsmart the wicked, no matter how clever they are. but you humiliate the proud. You, God, turn the darkness around me into light. If my God is with me, I can climb over enemy walls. The Lord"s promise always proves to be true. He protects those who trust in him. There is no Rock except our God. He clears the path I need to take. Even on steep mountains he keeps me from falling. so that my arms can bend the most powerful bow. You support me with your right hand. It is your help that has made me great. so that I could walk without stumbling. I did not stop until they were destroyed. They fell under my feet. You made my enemies fall before me. I destroyed those who hated me. but there was no one to save them. They cried out to the Lord, but he did not answer them. I smashed them like mud in the streets. You made me the ruler over nations. People I never knew now serve me. Those foreigners fall helpless before me! and come out of their hiding places shaking with fear. I praise my Rock, the God who saves me. How great he is! the one who puts people under my control. You, Lord, help me defeat those who attack me. You save me from cruel people. That is why I sing songs of praise to your name. to David and his descendants forever.

The Lord is my Rock, my fortress, my place of safety. He is my shield; by his power I am saved. God Most High let his voice be heard. and a powerful wind began to blow. He shows his faithful love to his chosen one,
I called to the Lord for help,
Death had its ropes wrapped around me.
The ropes of the grave wrapped around me.
In my trouble I called to the Lord.
The earth shook and shivered.
Smoke came from his nose.
He tore open the sky and came down!
He flew across the sky, riding on a Cherub angel
He wrapped himself in darkness that covered him like a tent.
Out of the brightness before him,
The Lord thundered from the sky;
He scattered his enemies with his arrows–
Lord, you shouted your command,
He reached down from above and grabbed me.
He saved me from my powerful enemies, who hated me.
They attacked me in my time of trouble,
He was pleased with me, so he rescued me.
The Lord rewarded me for doing what is right.
The Lord did this because I have obeyed him.
I always remembered his laws.
He knows I did nothing that was wrong.
So the Lord rewarded me for doing what is right.
Lord, you are faithful to those who are faithful.
You never do wrong to those who have done no wrong.
You help those who are humble,
Lord, you provide the flame for my lamp.
With your help I can defeat an army.
God"s way is perfect.
There is no God except the Lord.
God is the one who gives me strength.
He makes my feet as steady as those of a deer.
He trains me for war
Lord, you have given me your shield to protect me.
You cleared a path for my feet
I chased my enemies and caught them.
I struck them down, and they could not get up again.
God, you made me strong in battle.
You made my enemies turn and run away.
They cried out for help,
I beat them to pieces like dust blown by the wind.
You saved me from those who fought against me.
As soon as they heard about me, they were ready to obey.
They lose all their courage
The Lord lives!
He is the God who punishes my enemies for me,
He saves me from my enemies!
Lord, that is why I praise you among the nations.
The Lord helps his king win battle after battle.

19.verse_text: The heavens tell about the glory of God. The skies announce what his hands have made. They don"t make any sound we can hear. Their teaching reaches the ends of the earth. The sun"s tent is set up in the heavens. It begins its path across the sky like an athlete eager to run a race. and runs all the way to the other end. Nothing can hide from its heat. They give strength to his people. The Lord"s rules can be trusted. They help even the foolish become wise. They make people happy. The Lord"s commands are good. They show people the right way to live. It will last forever. The Lord"s judgments are right. They are completely fair. They are sweeter than the best honey dripping from the honeycomb. and good things come to those who obey them. so don"t let me commit secret sins. Don"t let sin control me. If you help me, I can be pure and free from sin. Lord, you are my Rock–the one who rescues me.
Each new day tells more of the story, and each night reveals more and more about God"s power.
You cannot hear them say anything.
But their message goes throughout the world.
It comes out like a happy bridegroom from his bedroom.
It starts at one end of the sky
Learning respect for the Lord is good.
His teachings are worth more than pure gold.
People cannot see their own mistakes,
Don"t let me do what I know is wrong.
May my words and thoughts please you.

20.verse_text: May the Lord answer you in times of trouble. May the God of Jacob protect you. May he support you from Zion. May he accept all your sacrifices. Selah May he make all your plans successful. We will praise the name of God. May the Lord give you everything you ask for. From his holy heaven he answered. With his great power he saved him. but we honor the Lord our God. but we survive and stand strong! Answer us when we call to you for help.
May he send you help from his Holy Place.
May he remember all the gifts you have offered.
May he give you what you really want.
We will celebrate when he helps you.
Now I know the Lord helps his chosen king.
Some give the credit for victory to their chariots and soldiers,
They fall in battle, totally defeated,

21.verse_text: Lord, your strength makes the king happy. He is so happy when you give him victory. You gave him what he asked for. Selah You put a golden crown on his head. You gave him life that goes on forever. You gave him honor and fame. You have given him the joy of being near you. and the faithful love of God Most High will keep him from falling. Your power will defeat those who hate you. you will burn them up like a blazing furnace. In your anger, Lord, you will completely destroy them; They will be removed from the earth. They wanted to do things they could not do. when you aim your arrows at their faces. We sing and play songs about your power!
And you gave him what he wanted.
You gave the king such wonderful blessings.
He asked for life, and you gave it.
You led him to victory that brought him great glory.
You have given him blessings that will last forever.
The king trusts in the Lord,
Lord, you will show all your enemies that you are strong.
When you appear, they will be swallowed by flames of fire.
That is because they made evil plans against you.
You will make them turn and run away
Lord, we lift you up with our songs of praise.

22.verse_text: My God, my God, why have you left me? You seem too far away to save me, too far to hear my cries for help! and I was not silent at night. But you did not answer me. You sit as King upon the praises of Israel. Yes, they trusted you, and you saved them. They trusted you and were not disappointed! People insult me and look down on me. They shake their heads and stick out their tongues at me. Maybe he will save you. If he likes you so much, surely he will rescue you!' You made me feel safe while I was still at my mother"s breasts. I was thrown into your arms as I came from my mother"s womb. Trouble is near, and there is no one to help me. They are like the powerful bulls of Bashan, and they are all around me. like a lion roaring and tearing at its prey. like water poured out on the ground. My bones have separated. My tongue is sticking to the roof of my mouth. You have left me dying in the dust. My enemies are looking at me; they just keep staring. and they throw lots for what I am wearing. You are my strength–hurry and help me! Save my precious life from these dogs. I will praise you in the great assembly. Honor him, you descendants of Jacob! Fear and respect him, all you people of Israel! He does not hate them. He does not turn away from them. He listens when they cry for help. In front of all these worshipers I will do all that I promised. You who have come looking for the Lord, praise him! May those in distant lands worship him, He rules all nations. and bowed down to worship him. Yes, everyone will bow down to him– all who are on the way to the grave, unable to hold on to life. Those who are not yet born will be told about him. about the good things the Lord has done.
My God, I kept calling by day,
God, you are the Holy One.
Our ancestors trusted you.
They called to you for help and escaped their enemies.
But I feel like a worm, less than human!
Everyone who sees me makes fun of me.
They say, 'Call to the Lord for help.
God, the truth is, you are the one who brought me into this world.
You have been my God since the day I was born.
So don"t leave me!
My enemies surround me like angry bulls.
Their mouths are opened wide,
My strength is gone, My courage is gone. a pack of evil people has trapped me. They have pierced my hands and feet. Protect me from the horns of the bulls. May your hearts be happy forever.
My mouth is as dry as a piece of baked pottery.
The 'dogs' are all around me–
I can see each one of my bones.
They divide my clothes among themselves,
Lord, don"t leave me!
Save me from the sword.
Rescue me from the lion"s mouth.
I will tell my people about you.
Praise the Lord, all you who worship him!
He does not ignore those who need help.
Lord, because of you I offer praise in the great assembly.
Poor people, come eat and be satisfied.
May those in faraway countries remember the Lord and come back to him.
because the Lord is the King.
The people have eaten all they wanted
Our descendants will serve him.
Each generation will tell their children

23.verse_text: The Lord is my shepherd. I will always have everything I need. He leads me on right paths to show that he is good. Your rod and staff comfort me. You welcomed me as an honored guest. and I will live in the Lord"s house a long, long time. He leads me by calm pools of water. I will not be afraid of any danger, because you are with me. My cup is full and spilling over.
He gives me green pastures to lie in.
Even if I walk through a valley as dark as the grave,
You prepared a meal for me in front of my enemies.
Your goodness and mercy will be with me all my life,

24.verse_text: The earth and everything on it belong to the Lord. The world and all its people belong to him. He built it over the rivers. Who can stand in his holy Temple? who have pure hearts, and who have not made false promises. They ask God, their Savior, to do good things. They go to the God of Jacob for help. Selah Open, ancient doors, and the glorious King will come in. He is the Lord, the powerful soldier. He is the Lord, the war hero. Open, ancient doors, and the glorious King will come in. The Lord All-Powerful is the glorious King. Selah
He built the earth on the water.
Who can go up on the Lord"s mountain ?
Only those who have not done evil, who have not used my name to hide their lies,
Good people ask the Lord to bless others.

25.verse_text: Lord, I put my life in your hands. and I will not be disappointed. My enemies will not laugh at me. But disappointment will come to those who try to deceive others. They will get nothing. Show me how you want me to live. You are my God, my Savior. You are the one I have been waiting for. Show me the tender love that you have always had. Because you are good, Lord, remember me with your faithful love. He shows sinners the right way to live. He leads them with fairness. who obey what he said in his agreement. But I ask you to forgive them all to show your goodness. he shows them the best way to live. and their children will get the land God promised. He teaches them about his agreement. Turn to me, and show me mercy. Help me solve my problems. Forgive me for all the sins I have done. They hate me and want to hurt me. I come to you for protection, so don"t let me be disappointed. I trust you to protect me. from all their enemies.
I trust in you, my God,
No one who trusts in you will be disappointed.
Lord, help me learn your ways.
Guide me and teach me your truths.
Remember to be kind to me, Lord.
Don"t remember the sinful things I did when I was young.
The Lord is good and does what is right.
He teaches his ways to humble people.
The Lord is kind and true to those
Lord, I have done many wrong things.
When people choose to follow the Lord,
They will enjoy good things,
The Lord tells his secrets to his followers.
I always look to the Lord for help. Only he can free me from my troubles.
I am hurt and lonely.
Free me from my troubles.
Look at my trials and troubles.
Look at all the enemies I have.
Protect me! Save me from them!
You are good and do what is right.
God, save the people of Israel

26.verse_text: Lord, you be the judge and prove that I have lived a pure life. I have depended on you, Lord, to keep me from falling. Judge my deepest thoughts and emotions. I depend on your faithfulness. I have nothing to do with hypocrites. Just look at my face, and you will see it. as I watch them take their revenge. But you do all those things to us. We did not break the agreement you gave us. We did not stop following you. The beer drinkers make up songs about me. Please accept me! God, I want you to answer me with love. I know I can trust you to save me. and don"t let me sink down deeper. Save me from those who hate me. Save me from this deep water. Don"t let the deep sea swallow me or the grave close its mouth on me. Out of your great kindness turn to me and help me! The Lord will be happier with this

May he help the helpless and punish those who hurt them. as long as the sun shines and the moon is in the sky. like showers falling on the land. Let peace continue as long as there is a moon. May all his enemies bow before him with their faces in the dirt. May the kings of Sheba and Seba bring their tribute to him. May all nations serve him. those in need who have no one to help them. He protects their lives. Their lives are important to him. Let him receive gold from Sheba. Always pray for the king. Ask God to bless him every day. and the hills be covered with crops. May the fields be as fertile as Lebanon, and may people fill the cities as grass covers a field. May people remember his name as long as the sun shines. May all nations be blessed through him, and may they all bless him. Only he can do such amazing things. Let his glory fill the whole world. Amen and Amen!

(This ends the prayers of David son of Jesse.)

73.verse_text: God is so good to Israel, to those whose hearts are pure. I almost fell into sin. and I became jealous of those proud people. They don"t have troubles like other people. What good is it to keep myself from sin? and you punish me every morning. but that would have made me a traitor to your people. but it was too hard for me. and I understood what will happen to the wicked. You make it easy for them to fall and be destroyed. and they will be ruined. Terrible things can happen to them, and they will be finished. that we forget when we wake up. You will make them disappear like the monsters in our dreams. I thought about such people and became upset. God, I was upset and angry with you! I acted like a senseless animal. You hold my hand. They don"t suffer like the rest of us.

Even God"s people turn to them
Those evil people say, 'God does not know what we are doing!

74.verse_text: God, why have you turned away from us for so long? Why are you still angry with us, your own flock? You saved us, and we belong to you. Use your power to defeat our enemies! You have saved us many times on this earth. and broke the heads of the sea monster. and left his body for animals to eat. and you make the rivers dry up. You made the sun and the moon. And you created summer and winter. Those foolish people hate your name! Never forget your poor, suffering people. because violence fills every dark place in this land. Don"t let them be hurt anymore. Let your poor, helpless people praise you. Remember, those fools challenged you. They insulted you again and again.

With your great power you split open the sea

Then I said to myself, 'What bothers me most is the thought

Our people will be telling this story to the last generation. We will all praise the Lord and tell about the amazing things he did. He gave the law to Israel. He gave the commands to our ancestors. He told them to teach the law to their children. 79.verse_text: God, some people from other nations came to fight your people. They ruined your holy Temple. They left Jerusalem in ruins. They let wild animals eat the bodies of your followers. No one is left to bury the bodies. The people around us laugh at us and make fun of us. against the people who do not honor you as God. and destroyed their land. Hurry, show us your mercy! We need you so much! That will bring glory to your name. Save us and forgive our sins for the good of your name. 'Where is their God? Can"t he help them?' Let us see you punish those people. Punish them for killing your servants. Use your great power to free those who are sentenced to die. Pay them back seven times for what they did to us. Punish them for insulting you. We will praise you forever. We will praise you forever and ever!
They left the bodies of your servants for the wild birds to eat.
Blood flowed like water all over Jerusalem.
The countries around us insult us.
Lord, will you be angry with us forever? Will your strong feelings continue to burn like a fire?
Turn your anger against the nations that do not know you,
Please don"t punish us for the sins of our ancestors.

Don"t give the other nations a reason to say,

80.verse_text: Shepherd of Israel, listen to us. You lead your people like sheep. Look at the young plant you raised. Reach out to the people you raised up. You sit on your throne above the Cherub angels. Let us see you. Come and save your people. Smile down on us and save us! How long will you be angry with us? you gave your people tears. Our enemies make fun of us. Smile down on us and save us! we were like your special vine. You forced other nations to leave this land, and you planted that vine here. and it sent its roots down deep and spread throughout the land. and its leaves shaded even the giant cedar trees. its shoots to the Euphrates River. Now everyone who passes by picks its grapes. Wild animals eat the leaves. Look down from heaven at your vine and protect it. Show them how angry you are and destroy them. Let us live, and we will worship you. Smile down on us and save us!
Shepherd of Israel, show your greatness to the tribes of Ephraim, Benjamin, and Manasseh.
Lord God All-Powerful, when will you listen to our prayers?
You made us the target of everyone"s hatred.
When you brought us out of Egypt,
You prepared the ground for it,
Its branches spread to the Mediterranean Sea,
God, why did you pull down the walls that protect your vine?
Wild pigs come and ruin it.
Look at the vine you planted with your own hands.
Our enemies have cut it down and burned it up.
Reach out and help your chosen one.
Then we will never leave you.
Lord God All-Powerful, accept us again.

Then no one will ever again remember the name Israel.' They have united against you. the people of Byblos, Ammon, and Amalek, the Philistines, and the people of Tyre. 84.verse_text: Lord All-Powerful, the place where you live is so beautiful! I am so excited! Every part of me cries out to be with the Living God. even the birds have found a home in your Temple. 86.verse_text: I am a poor, helpless man. Lord, please listen to me and answer my prayer! I am your servant, and you are my God. I trust in you, so save me. I have been praying to you all day. I am your servant, so make me happy. You love all those who call to you for help. Listen to my cry for mercy. I know you will answer me. No one can do what you have done.
